Flack went over and stared at the keys. "Two of them are the right siz "Sure. What do you shake them for? How do you make your dibs?" I didn't answer. He hung up. Almost at once the phone rang again. "Oh stop being silly. There's a lot of things about you I don't know. 
I didn't speak. Just waited. There was a dim chuckle over the wire. "T "I think you're very niceвЂ”really," she said softly. Then she turned qu "I don't think I'd care to employ a detective that uses liquor in any  "Nothing I say is nice. I'm not nice. By your standards nobody with le
